rooms.description: An inviting open lobby area that greets visitors with Bohemian decor.
A spacious living room integrating indoor plants and eclectic furniture for a relaxing vibe, following Vastu's principles of east-west alignment for energy flow.
A communal dining space with Bohemian accents and natural lighting.
The master bedroom with a private balcony for morning views; designed in line with Vastu guidelines placing the bed away from the door and windows.
Two adjacent bedrooms for children, decorated with vibrant Bohemian themes and ample storage space.
A comfortable guest room incorporating local craftsmanship and natural materials.
A multifunctional family space that can be used as a study or informal meeting area.
An intimate library with built-in bookshelves and ambient lighting designed to stimulate intellectual pursuits. Positioned away from the primary circulation path for quiet reading.

A private gym equipped with exercise equipment and ample ventilation. It is placed in a corner of the villa with limited external openings to maintain privacy while aligning with Vastu recommendations for energy flow.
A modest servant quarters area featuring basic amenities and storage.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance with a decorative archway adhering to local architectural norms.
Large windows strategically placed for natural light and ventilation throughout the villa.
Interior doors designed to facilitate ease of movement while maintaining privacy between rooms.
